Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1741 TIBURON DRIVE, WILMINGTON, North Carolina, 28403, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Live Oak Bancshares Inc operates as the bank holding company for the Live Oak Banking Company that provides various commercial banking products and services to individuals and businesses in North Carolina. The company accepts various deposit products, including noninterest-bearing demand, interest-bearing checking, money market, saving, and time deposits.
